Title: Around the World in 80 Days
Writer: Jules Verne (novel), David N. Titcher (screenplay), David Benullo (screenplay), David Andrew Goldstein (screenplay)
Actors: Jackie Chan, Steve Coogan, CÃ©cile De France, Robert Fyfe
Plot: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly 80 days.

tomatoConsensus: Hit-and-miss family fare that bares only the slightest resemblance to Verne's novel.
